original_text: And when they had mocked him, they stripped him of the robe and put his own clothes on him and led him away to crucify him.
korean_text: 희롱을 다 한 후 홍포를 벗기고 도로 그의 옷을 입혀 십자가에 못 박으려고 끌고 나가니라

sentences.original_text: And when they had mocked him,
they stripped him of the robe
and put his own clothes on him
and led him away to crucify him.
